title: Emerald Radiance: Floral Diamond Jhumka Earrings
materials: 22K Yellow Gold. Adorned with approximately 49.62 Carats of High-Quality Emerald Beads (62 beads in total) and 1.46 Carats of Natural Diamonds (104 diamonds in total). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Inspired by the floral motifs, these jhumkas feature a spiral design with emerald beads. The inner spiral is encrusted with pave-set diamonds. The design is intricately crafted to create a dazzling display of light and color, showcasing both traditional charm and contemporary elegance.
colors: Vibrant Emerald Green and Dazzling White Diamonds set against a backdrop of Rich Yellow Gold.
occasions: festive celebrations like Ugadi and Sankranthi
or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Can also be paired with contemporary outfits for a modern twist.
description: These statement earrings offer a unique blend of tradition and modern design, making them a truly special addition to any jewelry collection. The high-quality emeralds and diamonds ensure lasting beauty and value. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail, these jhumkas are a testament to the skill and artistry of Hyderabad's finest jewelers.
